summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD ESCAPE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V643000 (LATCHES/LOCKS/LINKAGES). WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 68 MPH, THE REAR PASSENGER DOOR FLUNG OPEN. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER (NORTHGATE FORD, CINCINNATI, OHIO) AND THE RECALL REPAIRS WERE COMPLETED. FIVE DAYS AGO, WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 70 MPH, THE DRIVER'S DOOR FLUNG OPEN. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE SAME DEALER AND WAS LEFT THERE FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND INFORMED THE  CONTACT THAT THE ISSUE WOULD BE ADDRESSED WITH THE DEALER. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 49,000. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
